      • randomize

        public void randomize(long randomSeed)
        Randomizes (shuffles) the data array in place. Needs to be redefined here because we need to randomize the weights as well.
        Overrides:
        randomize in class GeneralDataset<L,F>
        Parameters:
        randomSeed - A seed for the Random object (allows you to reproduce the same ordering)
